column2: Please refer to the below table and provide us necessary details.
Please refer attached pdf 'Authorization Request - Job Aid' to provide CRA authorization of business account.
For the payroll, please return us duly filled attached Payroll Enrollment Form for all employees.
Please also provide us below company details.
Authorized Signing officer – Last Name & First Name with position:-
Phone no. Of Authorized Signing officer:-
Name of Shareholders with SIN & Percentage of shareholding:-
Share Holder 1 - Percentage of Common Shares
Share Holder 1 - Percentage of preference shares
Share Holder 2 - Percentage of Common Shares
Share Holder 2 - Percentage of preference shares
Previous years T2 tax returns & Last year financial statements(FS)
Provide franchise documents if applicable, else ignore.
